'use strict';

/**
 * Hyperledger-Composer module. Hyperledger-Composer is a framework for creating
 * blockchain backed digital networks and exchanging assets between participants
 * via processing transactions.
 * <p>
 * Applications interact with the framework by instantiating the {@link Composer}
 * class.
 * </p>
 * <p><a href="diagrams/composer.svg"><img src="diagrams/composer.svg" style="width:100%;"/></a></p>
 * @module composer
 */

module.exports = require('./lib/embeddedconnectionmanager');
